["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Trisquel GNU/Linux 软件源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Trisquel 使用 APT 软件包管理系统，故其软件源使用方法与 Ubuntu 或 Debian 等相似。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}]," 文件，将文件内容替换为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"版本","items":[["10.0 LTS (nabia)",{"release_name":"nabia"}],["11.0 LTS (aramo)",{"release_name":"aramo"}],["9.0 LTS (etiona)",{"release_name":"etiona"}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-security main
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-security main
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-updates main
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-updates main
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"相关链接","children":"相关链接"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["官方主页 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://trisquel.info/en","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://trisquel.info/en"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["文档 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://trisquel.info/en/wiki/documentation","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://trisquel.info/en/wiki/documentation"}]]}],"
"]}]]}]

meta.title: Trisquel 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
